adjective.description: Affected with a wasting disease, especially pulmonary tuberculosis.
examples: from birth he was sickly and consumptive

adjective.description: Relating to the using up of resources.
examples: tourism represents an insidious form of consumptive activity

noun.description: A person with a wasting disease, especially pulmonary tuberculosis.

origin: Mid 17th century: from medieval Latin consumptivus, from Latin consumpt- consumed, from the verb consumere (see consume).
